working.title: Working At DU Global
description: We have a worldwide presence and are specialized for administrative and non-judgmental tasks cognate to visa, passport, identity management, and other citizen services for its client governments.

With over 35 centres operating in 6 countries, DU Global has successfully processed over 1.5 million+ applications since its inception and planning to expand to over 100 centers countrywide within the next 2 years.
At DU Global we are always seeking to hire the best talent in the industry.
We are always recruiting for all verticals of Sales, Marketing, Finance, Technology, Business Development and more.
If you think you can contribute to our success please drop your CVs at hr@dudigitalglobal.com

jobs.title: Submission Officer
jobs.description:
Freshers can also apply.

As a Visa Submission Officer, you will be responsible for handling visa applications and ensuring that all documentation is accurately prepared and submitted according to the requirements of various embassies and consulates.
responsibilities: Receive and review visa applications to ensure completeness and accuracy
Verify supporting documents such as passports, photographs, and financial statements
Enter applicant information into the visa application system and embassy portals
Communicate effectively with applicants regarding visa requirements
Coordinate appointments and interviews at embassies and consulates
Maintain records of visa applications and payments
Stay updated on changes in visa regulations
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in any discipline preferred
Basic computer knowledge and documentation skills
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment

jobs.title: Country Manager (Thailand)
jobs.description:
8+ years of experience required. Thailand citizen preferred (Indian origin acceptable).

As a Country Manager, you will be responsible for leading and managing overall operations in Thailand. The role involves strategic planning, team leadership, client and stakeholder management, operational excellence, and driving sustainable business growth while ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements.
responsibilities: Develop and implement strategic operational plans aligned with organizational goals
Identify opportunities for operational improvement, cost reduction, and efficiency gains
Lead and manage large operational teams to ensure high performance and engagement
Establish KPIs and performance metrics to monitor operational effectiveness
Analyze operational data and implement corrective actions where required
Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, stakeholders, and government partners
Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, policies, and procedures
Implement quality assurance measures to maintain high service standards
Identify operational risks and develop mitigation strategies to ensure business continuity
Develop and manage operational budgets while optimizing resource allocation
Drive continuous improvement initiatives and innovation using technology and best practices
Lead change management initiatives to support organizational growth
Manage vendor relationships to ensure effective partnerships and service delivery
qualifications: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Business, Management, or related field
8+ years of leadership or operations experience
Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills
